sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.DictionaryChoiceTables</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Returns a list of valid tables from sys_choice.
Used by choice_table on sys_dictionary.</description>
        <name>DictionaryChoiceTables</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var DictionaryChoiceTables = Class.create();
DictionaryChoiceTables.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},
	process: function(tableName) {
		var glideAggregate = new GlideAggregate('sys_choice');
		glideAggregate.addQuery('inactive', false).addOrCondition('inactive', '');
		glideAggregate.addAggregate('MIN', 'name');
		glideAggregate.query();
		
		answer=new Array();
		answer.push("");
		while(glideAggregate.next())
			answer.push(glideAggregate.name+"");
		return answer;
	},
	type: 'DictionaryChoiceTables'
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2013-09-20 11:12:28</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>04ac4033eb3301007128a5fc5206fed7</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>DictionaryChoiceTables</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="System (glidesoft)" source="glidesoft">5113bc203c31311068bcf327dfe37f8c</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_04ac4033eb3301007128a5fc5206fed7</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-12-30 20:09:29</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
